subject: Fish and Other Marine Life
Oceans
lead_paragraph: Anglers are lured to Montauk Point  each fall by the furious feeding frenzies of false albacore, bluefish and morone saxatalis — striped bass.
snippet: Anglers are lured to Montauk Point  each fall by the furious feeding frenzies of false albacore, bluefish and morone saxatalis — striped bass.
